title: Could a case currently before the Supreme Court result in a stronger presidential pardon?
subtitle: The case of Gamble v. United States concerned a criminal arrested for possession of a firearm. It can also have a significant impact on the President ' s power to pardon.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: If approved by the Supreme Court, Judge Cavanaugh could be a final vote on a case involving the possibility of substantially increasing the power of presidential pardon.
